name: The Last Bee
description:
Apis and Lili are two of the last bees in the world.
They are trapped in some hideous caves among ants and other creatures.
Help Apis find the key and free Lili.

  • single-player puzzle platform game featuring a cute bee
  • 50 small levels
  • Hand-drawn animations
  • Simple controls wasd + space
  • Non violent game
  • Royalty free music by David Fesliyan
